title: Five Stars
body: Fit as advertised, an old standard

title: Great jeans at a great price
body: My husband's favorite jeans. He wore Wranglers for years, which were baggy, until finding Lee's Regular Fit, which fit him perfectly. We could afford higher priced "designer" jeans, I suppose, but our lifestyle doesn't demand them--so why waste the money? These are just fine!

title: Great fit.
body: Hard to find length (29") in the stores.  Great fit.

title: Five Stars
body: Its ok

title: Lee jeans Regular Fit Straight Leg
body: I the first time ordered Lee jeans. Before always bought Levi's. I was waited by disappointment as jeans appeared less for the size from declared.

title: Five Stars
body: Great price and nice fit.  They look good as well, nothing too fancy, but a nice pair of jeans.

title: Excellent transaction & product
body: The Lee jeans I received are very good. I tried a few times to order more pairs and was never offered the same price...always much higher.I never placed a second order...to bad I would have been a repeat customer for years.

title: Great Jeans for the Price
body: I bought these for my husband.  Lee Jeans are some of the few that actually fit him well.  The jeans I ordered were perfect.  They were of a medium weight denim, good for summer.  He was pleased with them and they arrived a couple of days early based on the window of time given when they were ordered.  I will definitely purchase jeans here again!

title: Not what was expected!
body: The pictures presented differ absolutely from what I have received: the jeans are too baggy! they correspond to the relaxed but not to the regular fit. Dark stone color appeared more like 'pepper prewashed'. I give two stars because it is made of good heavy denim, otherwise these jeans are only good for working e.g. in the garden.

title: Lee Jeans are always good
body: These jeans are great, but ended up being not only too small, but too short for my growing teen.  There was nothing wrong with these jeans but I had to send them back.  Lee doesn't make the size we actually need.

title: Five Stars
body: good!

title: Lee .. always a GREAT pair of jeans !!
body: Lee jeans are one of my go to picks for blue jeans. Normally, they run very true to size. I do love these jeans, sturdy and comfy. But note, all their BLUE jeans run the same. Any colored version like these seem to run a bit small, as if you have to lose a few pounds! I have purchased a greenish, a taupe and this grey and those ALL run a touch smaller than the blue jean counterpart. Not much of a difference, but close to an inch or so in the waist. I call them my weight conscious jeans!! You cannot beat them for quality ..

title: High waist compared to Levi's 501
body: The jeans are well made and the size fits, but I wasn't aware of the waist. The waist is higher than I'm used to, and I doesn't feel comfortable in these. If you're looking for an alternative to Levi's 501 look elsewhere. The waist rise is 12.5' compared to Levi's 501 which have a rise of 11.25'.

title: Lee Men Jeans
body: It's hard to find jeans that are exactly the length they say they are and these were perfect jeans my husband loves them.

title: good
body: Very comfortable, the price is right.

title: A good deal on jeans
body: Product came as requested. It was a good deal. The brick and mortar stores never had my size. I love the internet.

title: Five Stars
body: suitable

title: Lee Men's Regular Fit Straight Leg Jean, Double Black, 42W x 29L
body: This size fits great! However, I returned from a 40 to a 42. In my opinion, they were a bit tight at 40. Recommend 2 sizes larger if you order. Hope I am not steering you wrong - just my body style. Hope this helps.

title: A great pair of jeans
body: These are the second jeans that I've purchased online.  The first were Wranglers, but the cut doesn't fit me well, I thought.  So, I decided to buy Lee this time.  Lee is what I grew up with in the ranch country of North Dakota.  Everyone wore Lee.  I, at least, always wanted something else, but now I'm back to Lee.  These are the best.  The cut is perfect for me.  The size is exactly what I ordered.  The material is soft, flexible, not scratchy and appears to be durable.  The construction is tight.  I don't anticipate any seams breaking loose.  And the seams aren't where they  would trouble in a saddle. They are precisely what I remembered from 50 years ago, and I guess I'll stick with Lee from now on.

title: A Brand I Can Trust
body: I purchased these jeans for my husband since he's been losing weight and most of his jeans have gotten to big. I myself own a couple pair of Lee jeans and love them. Lee is a brand I can trust with quality and fit, never have had an issue with any Lee jean not fitting as they should. Hope to find Lee jeans on Amazon for a long time. Thanks.

title: As expected just could not find local
body: Could not find anything but relaxed fit and they look like you are wearing a parachute.  Because I already know how lee jeans fit it was easy to order if you do not I recommend trying some on in a local store first.

title: Five Stars
body: great Lee product

title: Four Stars
body: Hard to find jeans for my boys but these fit.

title: Excellent Value
body: These are good jeans at a very good price.  Pay attention to the washing instructions.  They come out fine IF you wash them in cold water, as instructed.  Some of the color ran in my first pair because the water was too warm.  A rguably, the most comfortable pair of jeans I've ownec-from the beginning.

title: good fit, good price
body: Definitely worthwhile - much cheaper than the mall and the Lee website.  Fits well and the material is soft.  Would recommend highly

title: They are Lees
body: Great fitting Lee Jeans at a great price from Amazon. It gets harder to buy jeans that fit as you get older, but Lee fits the bill.

title: 非常好，我喜欢！很适合我！ Very good！I like it！It's for me
body: 非常好，我喜欢！很适合我！Very good！I like it！It's for me!

title: Best Jean
body: I find Lee makes the best jean for fit, And looks. They also wear the best on the knees. Can't beat them.

title: Great Pants
body: I have worn Lee's for years.  It has been harder & harder to get these jeans as they are not being sold in as many places.  The fit is perfect and they last a long time.  The quality is always predictable.  Lee doesn't seem to be taking any short cuts.

title: Jeans for my 12 year old
body: We have a very tall 12 year old and it's becoming more difficult to find pants for him, that fit.We are happy with the Lee Jeans.  They are slightly baggy on him, especially after he wore them for a day, but otherwise they are great.  Great quality and look.

title: more consistent fit than Levi's
body: I've read many reviews of both Lee and Levi jeans regarding the inconsistency of fit.  I've purchased many Lee jeans in this style, mostly on-line at Amazon and I've found a very consistent fit giving me the confidence to buy it on-line without first trying it on.  This jean may be a bit thinner than previously purchased jeans but on the other hand, the jeans also appear softer, especially after hanging them to line dry which makes them feel much stiffer when you put them on.  This particular color (Battleship) is very nice and the picture is a "true" color of the actual jean.

title: Looks good!
body: Nice looking "dress" jeans, well made, good color, comfortable, doesn't sag in the rear, and looks good on a man who has a small posterior.

title: Four Stars
body: Were a little tight.

title: small around the hips
body: waist was ok, hips were tight,nd the middle pulled up. So thertefore i returned them , maybe the style pants weren't for me.

title: Five Stars
body: My husband loves his jeans. Fit perfectly.

title: Horrible quality material.
body: Jean ripped after wearing it for just about 10 times. Not from any outside force (nails or tree brunch, etc), not near the seam, just right in the middle of the pant! This is the first time in my life I had it happening to a jean. And of course it happened right after I could send this garbage back.

title: Careful re size
body: Nice jeans, love the color selection. But these are smaller than usual. I had to return for an extra inch at the waist. And I'm always the same size.

title: It is fit for me, but more and more ...
body: It is fit for me , but more and more lee can not ship to China now , it is a pity

title: Fits well, looks good
body: Bought as gift for my grandson. It fits well and he likes them. Enough said!

title: These pants have the worst fit of any I have ever owned
body: These pants have the worst fit of any I have ever owned. If you have ever had a pair of sweat pants and noticed that they would fit the same if you put them on backwards, that is how these feel. You will not like trying to sit down or drive a car wearing these. Also, they run small, so order a size or two larger than you normally wear if you are going to purchase them. I put the pair I bought in the trash can at the end of the first day I wore them, as I don't like dealing with returns. As bad as Levi has gotten, I will have to stick with them, or start making my own pants out of old potato sacks. I will report back with a review of potato sack pants later.

title: too  big,I wouldn't be able to wear it
body: this product is too big,why,i order at 40*32,but it is 44*40,I wouldn't be able to wear it.

title: Great Jeans
body: Great fit and good value for the price.  Nice classic pair of black jeans.  When you're not wed to the idea of having someone else's name branded on your butt, these work just fine.

title: Four Stars
body: They feel slightly larger than the same model/different color jeans that I bought from Kohl's in store.

title: Three Stars
body: Fits as expected so far.

title: Solid Choice
body: Solid basic jeans.  They were durable, reasonably priced and fit as advertised.  I need to say eight more words but I really have nothing else to say.

title: Jean looks damaged after 1st wash.
body: The color fade unevenly after my first wash. This resulted in faded lines appearing on different parts and running across jean .

title: Five Stars

title: Excelente Vendedor
body: A la hora de realizar la compra, cumplió con las expectativas al momento de la entrega del pedido, en las condiciones que lo solicite y en el tiempo que acordó lo entrego y en muy buenas condiciones.

title: great pants for the right price
body: Looks even better after one wash, the fit is straight and comfortable, thinking of buying another pair with different color.You will definitely enjoy these!I still have a super old pair of these from like 7 years ago, I still wear it around the house and they still feel great and look decent.

title: Lee Jeans
body: I bought these jeans for my husband. They are the same brand, size and style that he usually wears. Item was as advertised.

title: These really look nice
body: I was very pleased at how well made these are. They fit my husband perfectly. I plan on buying more in different colors. Great fit Great price!

title: Great fit
body: I bought a pair for my husband. He is very conservative and hates button closures. Loves them specially for the zip fly closure. No more expensive Diesel's or Levis, will stick to Lee from now on.

title: Excellent pair of jeans. Gets dirty easily though but very comfortable.
body: Got these jeans for $25 on a sale, so can't complain about the pricing at all. Very comfortable jeans, have a great fit and look good. Fit around the waist, thigh and foot is perfect, no complaints. However, it tends to get dirty a little too easily and it feels as though it may fade after a certain number of washes.On the whole, very satisfied with this pair and would definitely buy more or recommend.

title: Lee Men's Regular Fit Jean, Walnut, 34x32
body: El 10 de Febrero se realizo la compra y aún no llega al casillero en miami, increible como fue enviado en burro

title: Five Stars

title: Perfect!!!
body: The fit, the color and the quality were what I expected and what we got. Will do it again.

title: LEE jeans
body: A very good product. The fit, style and color was exactly what I expected. And at a reasonable price. Amazon IS the place to shop.

title: A Little Disappointing
body: Definitely not the quality denim that they used to be - denim weight is clearly lighter than in Lees I purchased at Sears five years ago.  Also, this version is "made in Mexico"  On the bright side, they still fit well, like old Lee jeans just not quite the quality they used to be but that's true of just about everything these days so it is to be expected.

title: width is as expected but somewhat longer than other products ...
body: width is as expected but somewhat longer than other products of same size. My boyfriend is 6'3 and normally takes 36x36 but in this I believe he could have used a few inches less

title: Good style, tight like a straight jacket
body: The waist is loose and the thighs are so tight. If I had a knee problem this would serve as sufficient knee braces. Washed once and wore the pair for another few days. No improvement. If you have skinny thighs this will probably work out better. I always thought I had skinny thighs. I was wrong.Style was great though. People in the office thought I was dressing up to meet clients. Partly because the jeans were so tight I couldn't sit down and not rip something, so I ended up in an official-looking stiff-legged stance the majority of the work day.I shall not give up. Even if my physiology might be forever altered by these tight jeans, I shall not cease my fight until my legs either achieve freedom of movement or wither off from lack of blood.

title: great pants for work
body: nice pair of jeans with plenty of room in the crotch and snug at the ankle .I always liked levi but prices have soared within the past year for some reason but these will do.

title: Five Stars
body: Lee fits true to size!

title: Wrong order
body: Delivery and package were fine; as for the product, I ordered this Lee pants with size 36x30 for my dad, but received the wrong size! The color was correct, but I got a 34x30 and obviously doesn't fit him... I'm requesting a solution for the issue.

title: Pepperstone color a good compromise between standard dark color and over-processed stone wash
body: Fewer belt loops than similar Lee jeans bought a few years earlier. "Pepperstone" color a good compromise between standard dark color and over-processed stone wash.

body: When you find the jean you love, in your size, it's time to buy.  local stores usually only carry blue and black.

title: Great Jeans
body: Love Lee jeans. Just a bit darker than expected.

title: Looked Good, Had Problems but Received a New Pair...
body: UPDATE DEC 9, 2011:  My jeans are still holding up very well.  So, I have bought additional pair of Lee Jeans.  I am glad they stood behind their product.  I will continue to buy Lee Jeans.  Go Buddy Lee!  UPDATE NOV 28, 2010:  Lee responded to my emails concerning the pair of jeans that fell apart.  I was able to exchange the jeans for a new pair.  Hopefully, this was an isolated problem.  ORIGINAL REVIEW NOV 14, 2010:  I used to always buy Levis. But I bought a few pairs of Lee jeans because of the lower price for occassional wear, mainly on the weekends.  I actually liked the way they fit and they looked good.  Unfortunately, Lee jeans lack the durability you would expect in a pair of traditional jeans.  After a few months of occassional wear, they start to rip.  I had one pair completely fall apart and rip across the front from the top of the zipper to the inseam.  They did not even make a ripping noise, they just came apart.

Had to repair this seam.I have been buying these jeans locally and have an entirely better fitting jean, they aretruly 34W x 29L--Amazon's are more then 34W x 29L and also DARK BLUE JEANS INSTEAD OF PEPPERSTONE.The Salvation Army now has this disapointing Amazon order.  C. B.

title: Great fit for a tall guy.
body: Ordered a pair to see how they fit because finding something around the 36'x36' mark usually isn't easy and most of the time even then the sizing is hit and miss, which can get expensive since I'm in New Zealand.Not only did these fit perfect they have lasted well and are very comfortable.  A couple of different pairs of jeans from other manufacturers I ordered were loose around the waist so these might be closer to a size smaller.  The fit and double black colour means they suit younger people too which is usually the hardest part of finding tall jeans.  I will definitely be ordering more of these.

title: Great Jeans
body: Fast service - great product ... just as advertised.  They fit and look great ... very comfortable.  I used to wear Levis but over the past several years their product has gone down hill.  Lousy material and bad fit ... its a shame.  Now I wear Lee jeans exclusively.

body: The product arrived as advertized, on time, and in tact. The fit is true to size, and the color is right. Good quality, gook looking jeans.

title: Good luck with Lee's Jeans
body: I have had better fit, longevity and overall satisfaction with Lee jeans over the years than any other brand.Pocket size is good, zippers are sturdy, hems are nice and straight, and I've never had a side seam wander over to the front of my leg as I have with other brands. I'm 62, so I've tried Levi's, Eddie Bauer, Wrangler, Land's End and L.L. Bean and have found Lee jeans have become my favorite.

title: I like Lee jeans
body: I like Lee jeans.  They typically fit me much better than Levi's, especially with what my sister refers to as "no butt".  They don't ride low or make me look like I'm trying to emulate some kid trying to look "cool".

title: Four Stars
body: Good fit in hard to find size.

title: These are now my jeans of choice
body: These start just a little tight when you first put them on (my fault, if you know what I mean), but then stretch out within a couple of minutes (not stretch material, just natural give of denim). LOVE that I can get 29" inseams. I bought a 2nd pair of these, after I tried the first pair I ordered, because I liked them so much. I think this Delta color is the more trendy color, which I wear out, when I want to appear to be trendy - I think it actually does. Other traditional blue denim color I where more for everyday. I cannot tell yet about how long they'll last since I wear my other brands, as well, and I hardly ever wear jeans in the summer.Straight leg profile is a little narrower than most others - definitely narrower than Levis (not as narrow as Carhardt regular fit/tapered jeans). I happen to like the profile; a little tapered would be more to my preference, but these are definitely OK as is. As far as fit goes, these are good for me, but if you're a big thigh guy, you should probably go with relaxed fit.

title: Great
body: I got these for my fiancee and he loves them; they are one of his favorites out of all the pair that I ordered. Fit and color both good; recommend.

title: Where have I been?
body: About a year ago I purchased a pair of Lee jeans and was extremely surprised.  I appreciate their comfort and durability.  I have purchased many other better know "name brands" and brands of equality that cannot compare with Lee's.  The recent purchase I made again was extremely pleasing.  What a true "bang" for the buck.

title: Weird fit
body: I've had two pair of these pants in dune and one in a medium blue. Both of the dune-colored pair fit fine in the waist, were fine in the inseam, but were uncomfortably tight in the thighs. If I were a bodybuilder, I'd get it. I'm not. I'm a regular sized guy who doesn't have this issue with any other jeans, and I certainly don't expect this from a "regular" fit.

title: A decent jean.
body: Probably accurate sizing. Some manufacturers stretch the truth.

title: Better than I remember
body: I used to always buy Lee's jeans, and they were fine. For some reason I started buying other brands, and some were fine, while others were marginal. When I bought this pair, Lee's were least expensive, so I tried them again, and I was more pleased than I expected. They fit better than most brands, and they seem to be wearing at least as well as other brands.

title: Lee Converts
body: My husband Tom has always been a Wrangler man, cowboy that he is, but sadly, we could not find his size or preferred style in either Wrangler's or Levi's. Doing a bit of research and reading multiple reviews, we decided to try the Lee's brand of men's jeans. The order came quickly, and what a thrill to find that these jeans were everything we could have asked for and more! The fit is perfect, and the colors are just right for my traditional man. I love the dark label on the back of the jeans. Tom is happy, and when we have need for new jeans once again, we will order these again. The moral of the story is: be open to try new things, and don't fret when you can't find your old fallback anymore, because there might be something even better out there!

title: Best Fit in the Entire world
body: Most people put up with sloppy jeans that don't fit them.. and they don't look good in them.I'm a hard guy to fit at 5'6 and 125 lbs, 30W x 29LThese jeans come in lots of colors and sizes, and they are comfortable.And they are very reasonably priced. I bought several colors and finishes just to have a more versatile stack of pants to wear.Hey some people collect T-Shirts.. I collect these Jeans

title: Excellent fit!
body: Have worn these jeans for years, and they are always a great quality and  fit. So glad to find the Double Black Lee jeans on Amazon,  as I have not been able to find them in any store within 60 miles in over 3 years.

title: Great Jeans
body: The only reason there isn't a 5 star rating is that the jeans are now too thin to be comfortable-but we keep buying them because they are the ONLY brand that fits this particular body correctly.

title: Lee Regular Black Jeans
body: Duh, why didn't I go online before to find Black Lee jeans?  So much easier to shop online and get exactly what you need or want.  Thnks

title: Great Jeans
body: Great fitting, quality jeans at a very good price.

title: A Little Short
body: Overall the pair of Lee's measured out okay on the waist and was 1/2 inch short on the inseam length but was acceptable.  I washed and dried it and found no shrinkage and decided to keep it.

title: Honest price/performance product
body: The size range was the most important factor for picking them up. The price is also very good. By the end of the day a decent product.

title: Good/bad
body: I have bought several pairs of these, and here is the good and the bad.Good: They fit great, true to size, and they don't shrink. A great selection of colors, hard to find that in a 29" length. No more going to retail stores and being disappointed about the lack of selection in 29". A little stiff, but fabric softener takes care of that.Bad: There may be some quality issues with the fabric. On one pair, the seat ripped after three months and maybe three washings. But amazon allowed an exchange despite being outside the 30 day return period. Color issues: "Dune" and "Wheat" are virtually indistinguishable. "Black Quartz" is more blue than black.

title: Runs one size smaller than Levis
body: I ordered these as well as a regular fit set of Levis 505.A 32" waist has always fit well with little room so they are comfortable.The 505s fit like this.  The 32" Lees were hard to button.I returned them for a 33".  The 33s now fit like the Levis.Mark

title: excellent product, always with his traditional cut just what ...
body: excellent product, always with his traditional cut just what I expected for my job. I always like the recomiedo my levis

title: Fit as expected
body: For some time reluctant to buy clothes online, but size selection (an important consideration for me) is better than brick and mortar.  And so far everything I've ordered has fit perfectly.

title: Good buy.
body: I found these pants to be a good buy great quality. However they were oddly tight in the crotch area in comparison to other brands of the same size and style.

title: jeans
body: theses jeans are great.  the material is very good and the fit is great for an older man, no sag in the rear, and the legs are more slim.  they wash and dry fantastic.

title: Comfortable fit
body: I've had trouble finding regular fit jeans in my size and length.  These come the closest. They are a comfortable fit.  They are a still a bit long but not too bad (a 28 length would be best for me).
